item.description:
This ride will be half slab & half surface roads in search of new roads. Temps will be cool in the morning, in the 50's but will climb to the mid to upper 60's by noon. We will meet at the Hess on comm ave in newton at 10 am and make our way (about 45 min) to the milk bottle restaurant in Raynham for brunch at 11. Address: 785 Broadway‎, Raynham MA‎ 02767 From there we will descend to newport by way of providence, & kingstown in search of new routes and photos and on to Flo's Clam Shack for a late lunch at 2. Flo's on the web: http://flosclamshack.net/

After lunch, the rest of the day is up in the air, though looking to be back by 7-8 PM when the temps fall again.
item.name: Newport run
